name: sad-cat-ai
description: Create a cat AI video by a catergory selection and a simple run in the terminal. ## Video example ðŸŽ¥ [![sad-cat-ai-story-example](https://img.youtube.com/vi/WmVRgN40P8o/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WmVRgN40P8o) ## Installation ðŸ’¾ 1. clone this repo `git clone https://github.com/Ewan-Dev/sad-cat-ai.git` 2. install requirements `pip install -r requirements.txt` ## Run ðŸŽ¬ 1. run `python3 main.py` in this repo 2. the terminal will now prompt *catergory for the sad cat story (examples: beach trip, school, under the sea):* and then provide your topic 3. your final video will saved as **final.mp4**  *(it will be deleted and replaced next time you run the code do be sure to copy it)*
